documentation.text:
@dev Scaling unit for use in specific calculations,
 where 1 * 10**18, or 1e18 represents a unit '1'

@dev Adjust the scale of an integer
 @param adjustment Amount to adjust by e.g. scaleBy(1e18, -1) == 1e17
